data.name: Multiply Factory
data.detailed_description:
Multiply Factory is not just a factory building game. You will enjoy building stuffs within a 3-D space with stairs connecting different floors, and finish missions to unlock more challenging task.

It’s not an easy game. The most intelligent gamer will exploit their brain to optimize the production line, work out more products within less time and complete missions with more effective system.

featrue
  • Collect minerals.
  • Create advanced items.
  • Build production line with belt and inserter.
  • Use stair pass the multi floor Map.
  • Unlock buildings, items, maps.

Are you ready? Start to build your industrial empire !!

For more details on the game follow us on @timeshrinkgame

data.short_description: Multiply Factory is a factory building game. Build your own multiple-layer factory within a 3-D space with belts, inserters, factories and stairs. Enjoy the fantasy of manufacturing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel or M1, 2 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
